name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程涵蓋通過傳導，對流和輻射傳熱的熱傳輸過程。 本課程強調適用於工程熱分析的基本工程科學原理。學生將學習如何應用能量守恆來使用控制體積，並通過數學公式（包括穩態和暫態分析）來表達能量守恆，重點是與傳熱相關的基礎物理學和基礎數學。
This course covers thermal transport processes via conduction, convection, and radiation heat transfer. This course stresses fundamental engineering science principles applied to engineering thermal analysis. Students will learn to apply the conservation of energy to control volumes and express the conservation of energy through mathematical formulations, including both steady state and transient analyses, with emphasis on the fundamental physics and underlying mathematics associated with heat transfer.
schedule:
第01週 CFD basics and ANSYS Fluent Introduction
第02週 Introduction to heat transfer and rate laws
第03週 Fourier’s Law and heat diffusion equation
第04週 Rate equations and conservation of energy
第05週 Introduction to conduction
第06週 One-dimensional steady-state conduction
第07週 Two-dimensional steady state heat transfer: Finite difference method
第08週 Transient conduction, lumped capacitance method
第09週 Midterm 期中報告
第10週 Introduction to boundary layers
第11週 Introduction to external flow heat transfer
第12週 Introduction to internal flow heat transfer
第13週 Introduction to natural convection
第14週 Introduction to phase change heat transfer
第15週 Introduction to radiation heat transfer
第16週 Radiation exchange between surfaces
第17週 Radiation exchange between surfaces
第18週 Final 期末報告
scorePolicy:
